829960.name: MechWarrior Online™ Solaris 7 Hero Pack
829960.description:
Ladies and Gentlemen of the Inner Sphere we are proud to present the Solaris 7 Heroes Pack.

The Solaris 7 Hero Pack Features 7 New Hero 'Mechs sporting unique hard points and flashy paint jobs. All Solaris Heroes feature a 30% C-Bill Boost. The Pack also includes 7 'Mechbays to house your new mechs. The Solaris Pack contains 6 new customizations Decals including a decal every Pilot in this sector wants, a Jump Jet Fuel Sponsorship Decal! You can get that and more with this pack to show off your Solaris 7 Pride! (decals are colorable). The Solaris 7 Hero pack includes 3 Warhorns that are truly unique. Taunt your enemy with VO lines, Folly FX and Crowd Cheers. These babies are Solaris 7 branded. Finally, the Solaris 7 Boosted Standing Item shows your Solaris Spirit and boosts your Accolades by 5%! Combine that with the 30 Days of Active Premium time included in this pack and you will be rolling in currency! Premium Time increases your ingame earnings when you play! C-Bill(50%), XP(50%), and Accolades(5%)

The Solaris 7 Hero Pack Includes:
  • 7 Solaris Hero 'Mechs with Unique hardpoints and 30% C-Bill Boost
  • 7 'Mech Bays
  • 3 Warhorns featuring Taunts, Folly FX, and Crowd Reactions
  • 1 Boosted Standing Item that gives you 5% Accolades Boost (Premium Time will also grant a 5% Accolades boost)
  • 6 Solaris based “Sponsor Decals”
  • 30 Days Active Premium Time
